channel.title: Client Cache
channel.description: How could I make a client with a code like this [code=java] String[] strings_3_ = {".jagex_cache_" + i_2_, ".file_store_" + i_2_}; [/code] Run the cache from the folder the client files are in? I don't want people to have to put the cache into their C:/ drive just to play.

item.title: Client Cache
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“mrcrispypwn, post:1, topic:390196”]How could I make a client with a code like this

String[] strings_3_ = {".jagex_cache_" + i_2_, ".file_store_" + i_2_};

Run the cache from the folder the client files are in? I don’t want people to have to put the cache into their C:/ drive just to play.[/quote]
Change the findCacheDir() or whatever it’s called in your signlink.java to “./cache” instead of “C:\cache”.

Read full topic
